DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Adipose Tissue Graft Performed Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to adipose tissue (fat) grafting performed in breast reconstruction.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Adipose Tissue Graft Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy._A specialized form of connective tissue consisting primarily of adipocytes (fat cells), surrounded by a meshwork of collagen fibers._Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A specialized form of connective tissue consisting primarily of adipocytes (fat cells), surrounded by a meshwork of collagen fibers.

Executed and carried through to completion.
